CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 11 shows XRD patterns of the polymer thin films deposited on OTSmodified Si / SiO 2 substrates.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer thin films |
| OTSmodified Si |
| SiO 2 substrates |

The three "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "polymer thin films," "OTSmodified Si," and "SiO 2 substrates." These entities are identified as materials because they are noun phrases that refer to physical substances or materials used in a process or context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer thin films |

After removing entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name," the only valid entity left is "polymer thin films." This is because "OTSmodified Si" and "SiO 2 substrates" are not clearly identified as materials, but rather as modified surfaces or substrates. Therefore, they do not meet the criteria for being considered "Material Name" entities.
